title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version of the Java editor, a popup menu should appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This menu allows users to add breakpoints and marks, among other features. However, currently, the popup menu does not appear.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
This should trigger a popup menu to appear, but it does not.
EB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
A popup menu should appear, allowing users to add breakpoints and marks.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
